Package isocline.reflow

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Activity
    Indicates that an activity can be controlled.
    ExecuteEventChecker
    Provides the function to when whether method is executed every time execution event occurs.
    FlowableWork<T>
    It is an interface that enables play control.
    FunctionExecFeature  
    Plan
    Plan class for process flow.
    PlanDescriptor
    An interface to implement the function to pass schedule setting status information to WorkScheduler
    Work
    An interface implemented by an object that defines the underlying operation.
    WorkEvent
    A interface that represents the event to be delivered when the work object is executed.
    WorkFlowPattern  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    Configuration class for FlowProcessor Example: // for high-end environments FlowProcessor processor = FlowProcessorFactory.getProcessor("perform", Configuration.PERFORMANCE); // for low-end environments FlowProcessor processor = FlowProcessorFactory.getProcessor("echo", Configuration.ECHO); // user Reflow Configuration config = Configuration.createOrigin() .setInitThreadWorkerSize(3) .setMaxThreadWorkerSize(12) .setThreadPriority(Thread.NORM_PRIORITY) .lock(); FlowProcessor processor = FlowProcessorFactory.getProcessor("user", config);
    FlowProcessor
    Base class for Plan management and thread management
    FlowProcessorFactory
    Creates and returns a default FlowProcessor implementation object.
    PlanImpl
    Process various settings related to the execution of the job.
    Re  
    Time
    Utility Class with time setting related functions
    WorkFlow<T>  
    WorkHelper  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FlowProcessException
    Exception thrown when process flow task occurs error.
